skill_constraints: Key person dependency on DevOps. Overallocated Frontend in Sprint 5.
resource_bottlenecks: DevOps in Sprint 1-2, Frontend in Sprint 5.
mitigation_strategies: Re-balance tasks in Sprint 5, cross-train a backend dev on DevOps.

mitigation_strategies: New developer can absorb high-complexity FE tasks, reducing risk.

scenario_name: Risk Mitigation Focus (5 members, adjusted plan)
skill_constraints: Requires dedicated time for knowledge transfer.
